flawed_nl_solution:
Brittney can chop 15/5 = <<15/5=3>>3 onions in one minute.
Carl can chop 20/5 = <<20/5=4>>4 onions in one minute.
Brittney can chop 3 x 30 = <<3*30=90>>90 onions in 30 minutes.
Carl can chop 4 x 30 = <<4*30=102>>102 onions in 30 minutes.
Carl can chop 102 - 90 = <<102-90=12>>12 more onions than Brittney in 30 minutes.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 102. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
